Package com.root.service

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.root.service.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service
public class UserServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserService
This class is to interact with Controller UserServiceImpl will interact with UserDAOImpl internally This Service class is mainly works with BEAN objects

    java.lang.String insertUser​(UserBean userBean)
